lead_paragraph: The U.S. Olympic Committee and the sports it oversees are behind the curve when it comes to placing women and minorities in key coaching and leadership positions, according to a set of "scorecards" the federation has released that chart progress over the past three years.

headline.print_headline: US Olympic Sports Lag on Minority, Women Hiring
headline.main: US Olympic Sports Lag on Minority, Women Hiring
